synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The compound is pale-yellow, very stable under atmospheric conditions, and highly soluble in common organic solvents.

solvents.name: methanol
solvents.amount: Layered over the solution after cooling to room temperature

synthesis_conditions.yield: Yellow crystals obtained after several weeks
synthesis_conditions.crystallization_method: Cooling to room temperature followed by careful layering of methanol over the solution
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Single-crystal X-ray diffraction analysis confirms it as a fullerene-linked MOF.
